result.eng: Do you think that she is right?
result.ga: An dóigh leat go bhfuil an ceart aici
result.orig: An dóigh leat go bhfuil an ceart aici
result.html: An dóigh leat go bhfuil an ceart aiciDo you think that she is right?
result.ponchtml: An dóiġ leat go ḃfuil an ceart aiciDo you think that she is right?

result.eng: Did she have a long life?
result.ga: An raibh saol fada aici
result.orig: An raibh saol fada aici
result.html: An raibh saol fada aiciDid she have a long life?
result.ponchtml: An raiḃ saol fada aiciDid she have a long life?

result.eng: She speaks excellent Irish.
result.ga: Tá an-Ghaeilge aici
result.orig: Tá an-Ghaeilge aici
result.html: Tá an-Ghaeilge aiciShe speaks excellent Irish.
result.ponchtml: Tá an-Ġaeilge aiciShe speaks excellent Irish.

result.eng: She has two children.
result.ga: Tá beirt pháistí aici
result.orig: Tá beirt pháistí aici
result.html: Tá beirt pháistí aiciShe has two children.
result.ponchtml: Tá beirt ṗáistí aiciShe has two children.

result.eng: She was young and healthy.
result.ga: Bhí sise óg agus bhí a sláinte aici
result.orig: Bhí sise óg agus bhí a sláinte aici
result.html: Bhí sise óg agus bhí a sláinte aiciShe was young and healthy.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sise óg agus ḃí a sláinte aiciShe was young and healthy.

result.eng: I think she hates me.
result.ga: Ceapaim go bhfuil an ghráin aici orm
result.orig: Ceapaim go bhfuil an ghráin aici orm
result.html: Ceapaim go bhfuil an ghráin aici ormI think she hates me.
result.ponchtml: Ceapaim go ḃfuil an ġráin aici ormI think she hates me.

result.eng: She does not have a good command of Irish.
result.ga: Níl an Ghaeilge ar a comhairle féin aici
result.orig: Níl an Ghaeilge ar a comhairle féin aici
result.html: Níl an Ghaeilge ar a comhairle féin aiciShe does not have a good command of Irish.
result.ponchtml: Níl an Ġaeilge ar a coṁairle féin aiciShe does not have a good command of Irish.

result.eng: She has no sense.
result.ga: Níl aon chiall aici
result.orig: Níl aon chiall aici
result.html: Níl aon chiall aiciShe has no sense.
result.ponchtml: Níl aon ċiall aiciShe has no sense.

result.eng: She has no interest in men.
result.ga: Níl aon suim aici sna fir
result.orig: Níl aon suim aici sna fir
result.html: Níl aon suim aici sna firShe has no interest in men.
result.ponchtml: Níl aon suim aici sna firShe has no interest in men.

result.eng: She has a college degree in economics.
result.ga: Tá céim ollscoile san eacnamaíocht aici

result.html: Tá céim ollscoile san eacnamaíocht aiciShe has a college degree in economics.
result.ponchtml: Tá céim ollscoile san eacnamaíoċt aiciShe has a college degree in economics.

result.eng: She has the voice of a crow. She sounds like a crow.
result.ga: Tá glór préacháin aici
result.orig: Tá glór préacháin aici
result.html: Tá glór préacháin aiciShe has the voice of a crow. She sounds like a crow.
result.ponchtml: Tá glór préaċáin aiciShe has the voice of a crow. She sounds like a crow.

result.eng: She has a good job.
result.ga: Tá post maith aici
result.orig: Tá post maith aici
result.html: Tá post maith aiciShe has a good job.
result.ponchtml: Tá post maiṫ aiciShe has a good job.

result.eng: She has an interest in music.

result.html: Tá suim aici sa cheolShe has an interest in music.
result.ponchtml: Tá suim aici sa ċeolShe has an interest in music.

result.eng: Does she have a car?
result.ga: An bhfuil carr aici
result.orig: An bhfuil carr aici
result.html: An bhfuil carr aiciDoes she have a car?

result.eng: She's had a baby for a month.
result.ga: Tá leanbh aici le mí

result.html: Tá leanbh aici le míShe's had a baby for a month.
result.ponchtml: Tá leanḃ aici le míShe's had a baby for a month.

result.eng: What does Aisling do when she has free time?

result.ga: Tá Araibis líofa aici

result.ponchtml: Tá Araibis líofa aiciShe speaks fluent Arabic.

result.eng: She is married with three children.
result.ga: Tá sise pósta agus triúr clainne aici
result.orig: Tá sise pósta agus triúr clainne aici
result.html: Tá sise pósta agus triúr clainne aiciShe is married with three children.
result.ponchtml: Tá sise pósta agus triúr clainne aiciShe is married with three children.

result.eng: She disliked me immediately.
result.ga: Bhí col aici láithreach liom
result.orig: Bhí col aici láithreach liom
result.html: Bhí col aici láithreach liomShe disliked me immediately.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí col aici láiṫreaċ liomShe disliked me immediately.

result.eng: She has a talent for asking clever questions.
result.ga: Tá sé de bhua aici ceisteanna cliste a chur
result.orig: Tá sé de bhua aici ceisteanna cliste a chur
result.html: Tá sé de bhua aici ceisteanna cliste a churShe has a talent for asking clever questions.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé de ḃua aici ceisteanna cliste a ċurShe has a talent for asking clever questions.

result.eng: She has a talent for keeping money flowing from pocket to pocket.
result.ga: Tá de bhua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeacht ó phóca go póca
result.orig: Tá de bhua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeacht ó phóca go póca
result.html: Tá de bhua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeacht ó phóca go pócaShe has a talent for keeping money flowing from pocket to pocket.
result.ponchtml: Tá de ḃua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeaċt ó ṗóca go pócaShe has a talent for keeping money flowing from pocket to pocket.

result.eng: She was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.
result.ga: Ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonar
result.orig: Ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonar
result.html: Ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonarShe was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ cead aici dul amaċ as an teaċ ina haonarShe was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.

result.eng: Her eyes were red from how much she had been crying.
result.ga: Bhí a dhá shúil dearg ar mhéad is a bhí caointe aici
result.orig: Bhí a dhá shúil dearg ar mhéad is a bhí caointe aici
result.html: Bhí a dhá shúil dearg ar mhéad is a bhí caointe aiciHer eyes were red from how much she had been crying.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a ḋá ẛúil dearg ar ṁéad is a ḃí caointe aiciHer eyes were red from how much she had been crying.

result.eng: Pursuing a woman who didn't fancy him.
result.ga: A dh'iarraidh mná nach raibh toil aici do
result.orig: A dh'iarraidh mná nach raibh toil aici do
result.html: A dh'iarraidh mná nach raibh toil aici doPursuing a woman who didn't fancy him.
result.ponchtml: A ḋ'iarraiḋ mná naċ raiḃ toil aici doPursuing a woman who didn't fancy him.

result.eng: Babaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ga: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é
result.orig: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é
result.html: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ponchtml: Dar le Babaí gurḃ é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aiṫne aċ ní raiḃ dul aici smaoineaṁ cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
